text: Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly evolving and its use is expanding quickly, becoming a ubiquitous part of everyday life. Indeed, AI has transformed the learning processes. Yet, its integration into the educational system faces significant challenges and raises ethical concerns. The aim of this research is to explore the opportunities, advantages, and obstacles associated with AI in education. To achieve this, a systematic review of the pertinent literature was conducted to pinpoint the focal areas of current research and to deepen the understanding of AI technology for educators and to suggest avenues for future investigations. The results indicate that the implementation of AI in education is more advanced in developed nations and has gained prominence during the Industry 4.0 era. The paper also addresses various challenges and offers recommendations.
